description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Tower Defense, more and better! Protect your base by placing turrets and destroy incoming enemy forces! Use your resources wisely to achieve victory! The Blitzkrieg edition features more turret types and enemies than the original Red Invasion, and a total of 40 new missions that provide hours of enjoyment. Red Invasion: Tower Defense Blitzkrieg is brought to you by Milkstone Studios.
